text: <Sanctus> beda was iboren her on breotene mid us & he wisliche <writen> awende þæt þeo <englisc> leoden þurh weren ilerde.
& he þeo <cnotten> unwreih þe questiuns hoteþ þa derne digelnesse þe <deorwurþe> is.
Ælfric abbod þe we alquin hoteþ he was bocare & þe <fif> bec wende, Genesis, Exodus, Vtronomius, Numerus, Leuiticus.

<Þurh> þeos weren ilærde ure leoden on englisc þet weren þeos biscopes <þeo> bodeden cristendom, wilfrid of <Ripum>, Johan of beoferlai, <Cuþbert> of Dunholme, Oswald of wireceastre, Egwin of heoueshame, <ældhelm> of malmesburi, swiþþun, æþelwold, Aidan, Biern of wincæstre, <Paulin> of rofecæstre, Sanctus Dunston & Sanctus ælfeih of cantore buri, þeos <lærden> ure leodan on englisc.
Næs deorc heore liht ac hit fæire glod.
Nu <beoþ> þeo leore forleten & þet folc is forloren, nu beoþ oþre leoden þeo <læreþ> ure folc & feole of þen lorþeines losiæþ & þæt folc forþ mid.
Nu sæiþ <ure> drihten þus,Sicut aquila prouocat pullos suos ad uolandum & super eos uolitat.
Þis beoþ godes word to worlde asende, þæt we sceolen fæier feþ <festen> <to> <him>.
